title: Story in the rocks
creator_credit: Marten Toonder Films, Bert Haanstra and Han Van Gelder
brief_description: Fossils - the remains of ancient animals and plants preserved in rock strata - reveal little to the uninitiated, but an expert can read a whole history into the skeleton of a fish petrified in rock or reconstruct the appearance of an extinct animal from fragments of bone or even a footprint.
creator_credit_for_label: Marten Toonder Films, Bert Haanstra and Han Van Gelder
